name: orgid-subgraph
description: The ORGiD subgraph maps the ORGiD Contract with events in GraphQL

scripts.codegen: graph codegen && mustache config/mainnet.json src/constants.template.ts > src/constants.ts
scripts.prepare:ropsten: mustache config/ropsten.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/ropsten.json src/constants.template.ts > src/constants.ts
scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/mainnet.json src/constants.template.ts > src/constants.ts
scripts.deploy:ropsten: yarn prepare:ropsten && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ windingtree/orgid-subgraph-ropsten
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ windingtree/orgid-subgraph
